text: First time at this location and it was very good. I got a combination with white sauce and even my 2 year old ate 2 pieces.. yummm

name: Matthew Marfell
text: Really like Mountain Mike's, but ordered for delivery and asked for a thin crust. I even called back to make sure it was thin crust. Pizza arrived and to my surprise when I opened it, regular crust. I called to tell them about the wrong order and they could care less. I will not be ordering from them ever again. There loss.

text: Love hitting the buffet and the price is very affordable with soda included can't beat that...

text: The pizza is ok, flavor is a bit bland. Crust was good. Interior is large and well kept.

text: Lunch buffet is cheap but so was the pizza and salad. I‚Äôd say for an average inexpensive lunch it‚Äôs ok.

text: First and last time I'll ever order a pizza from here. Spent more than $20 for a large all meat, and the toppings were unbelievably scarce! I understand almost no food establishment looks as advertised, but this was ridiculous. I could have ‚Ä¶More

name: llww
text: Best pizza place in the area! I always order sizzling beacon speciality pizza plus one large topping beacon pizza, they are so delicious and so cheesy! Yammy! One good thing is, if you order online, there are coupons you can use which will give you a good deal at the same time you will taste best pizza! Highly recommended!
